llm.feedback: Remove the UST10Y lines – the draft must focus solely on DXY.  Keep each line as one sentence and format exactly as “Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %”.  Add a second Up scenario: Fed cut + PCE > 3 % or NFP > expectations (7XH2DKEKV) → DXY rises 50‑100 bp, watch the PCE/NFP release, probability ≈ 30 % (cite 7XH2DKEKV).  Keep the Down scenario for a Fed hike (7XH2DKEKV) → DXY falls 200 bp, watch the Fed meeting announcement, probability 14 % (cite 7XH2DKEKV).  Adjust the first Up probability to 86 % (cite B1KYJ1GPU etc.) and ensure all citations are only for specific facts or numbers.  The final output must contain exactly four items: two Ups (Fed cut, Fed cut + high PCE/NFP) and two Downs (Fed hike, optional “Fed cut fails” if you wish to keep four, but then set probability 14 % and cite the same Fed‑meeting IDs).  Remove any redundant or non‑DXY references and keep the catalyst window Sept 16‑17 2025.
